entry.title: Monday night: Snow. Low minus 13.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy after midnight then snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southwest 20 km/h except gusting to 60 over southern sections early this evening. Wind becoming light early this evening. Low minus 13. Wind chill minus 16 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 3. POP 60%
entry.summary: Snow ending in the morning then mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 12 in the morning and minus 5 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 9. POP 60%
